name: dg-fullstack
description: Shal Roosari Shop - Full Stack Application

scripts.install-deps: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean: cd client && rmdir /s /q build node_modules && cd ../server && rmdir /s /q node_modules
scripts.setup-complete: npm run install-deps && npm run init-db && cd server && npm run setup
scripts.production: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm start
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-deps && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: cd client && npm install && npm run build

author: Korosh
